title.rendered: Suntory Whisky 100th Anniversary Japanese Blended Whisky 43% 700ml.

content.rendered: This Suntory special edition was released to commemorate Suntory Limited’s 100th anniversary, being released 1899-1999, in blue ceramic bottle with white engraved barleys. The words on the bottles are a homage to Keizo Saji (1919-1990), Shinjiro Torii’s second son, and the second generation of Suntory, who was instrumental in making Suntory a leader in the whisky industry.

excerpt.rendered: This Suntory special edition was released to commemorate Suntory Limited’s 100th anniversary, being released 1899-1999, in blue ceramic bottle with white engraved barleys.
